options.content:
## About

These graphs show you the current status of our clusters and which tools are being run on [UseGalaxy.eu](https://usegalaxy.eu). Our primary cluster is a Condor cluster running in the [deNBI cloud](https://www.denbi.de/).

targets.query: SELECT "users" FROM "active_users" WHERE ("host" = 'sn06.galaxyproject.eu') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "timespan"
SELECT mean("count") FROM "cluster.queue" WHERE ("host" = 'maintenance.galaxyproject.eu') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state" fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cluster.queue" WITH KEY = "schedd"
list.description: Host running Galaxy and serving user's requests.
list.label: Galaxy host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cluster.queue" WITH KEY = "schedd"
